easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I am a coin you can flip in the air. What am I?

medium.q: I am a 5-letter word where remove my first letter and I become something you wear on your feet. Remove the new first letter and I become something you do with your hands. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a progression: Shoes -> Shoes without S -> hoe(s) without H?

hard.q: A box contains three red, three blue, and three green balls. You draw two balls without looking. What is the probability that the two balls have different colors, expressed as a fraction?
hard.hint: Count the favorable outcomes over total outcomes; consider color matches vs. non-matches.
